content.question: A block of mass <math alttext="M" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>M</mi></math> is initially moving to the right with a speed <math alttext="v sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math> towards a second block of mass <math alttext="2 M" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mi>M</mi></math> which is at rest. The blocks collide elastically, and the more massive block slides up a curved incline and reaches a maximum height <math alttext="h sub max" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>h</mi><mi>max</mi></msub></math> before sliding down the incline. There is negligible friction between both blocks and the horizontal and inclined surfaces. Which of the following is a correct expression for <math alttext="h sub max" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>h</mi><mi>max</mi></msub></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator v sub 0, end sub, squared, and denominator 18 g, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><msup><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mn>18</mn><mi>g</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator v sub 0, end sub, squared, and denominator 8 g, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><msup><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mn>8</mn><mi>g</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 2 v sub 0, end sub, squared, and denominator 9 g, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>9</mn><mi>g</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator v sub 0, end sub, squared, and denominator 2 g, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><msup><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>g</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator 2 v sub 0, end sub, squared, and denominator 9 g, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>9</mn><mi>g</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>
